title: Shake-Ups
description:
John Hodgman hosts as Bowen Yang, Sarah Skilling and Kahlie Towle share about startling surprises in life.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, The Bad Plus, Sarah Skilling, Aimee Mann, Bowen Yang, Ben Talmi, Kahlie Towle, John Hatchman)
